Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Update baseline version and add release process doc" (#1199) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Remove extra PartConstraintData.json" (#1198) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened issue "OpenXmlPackage.SaveAs() corrupts file names" (#1197) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Describe the bug**
`OpenXmlPackage.SaveAs()` corrupts names of the internal package files.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

[base.pptx](https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/files/9439380/base.pptx)

```C#
using var pres = PresentationDocument.Open("base.pptx", true);
var savedAs = pres.SaveAs("modified.pptx");
savedAs.Close();
```

**Observed behavior**
The following renaming happened:

/ppt/slides/slide1.xml -> /ppt/slides/slide12.xml
/ppt/slides/slide2.xml -> /ppt/slides/slide21.xml

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5969304/187066700-8539b539-be1a-4609-ab5a-355e2b58c88d.png)

**Expected behavior**
The original names of /ppt/slides/slide1.xml and slide2.xml should not be changed.

**Desktop:**
 - OS: Windows 10
 - .NET Target: .NET 6
 - DocumentFormat.OpenXml Version: 2.17.1
